mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manager(managerno, id, passwd,kind, name, position, phone, email, zipcode, address1, address2, files,thumbs,filesizes, rdate) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(managerno), 0)+1 as managerno FROM manager), #{id}, #{passwd}, #{kind}, #{name}, #{position}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{files}, #{thumbs}, #{filesizes}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT managerno, id, passwd, kind, name, position, phone, zipcode, address1, address2, files,thumbs,filesizes, rdate FROM manager ORDER BY managerno ASC
